attributes.action: House our own ex servicemen and our own homeless in Doncaster
attributes.additional_details: Instead of helping other people start helping those who have helped our country ex servicemen who have become homeless and our on homeless people in and around Doncaster
attributes.background: The Home Office has taken hotels across the country to house refugees and to quarantine travellers under coronavirus restrictions . The Danum Hotel, in Doncaster has been taken over by the Home Office, for dozens of men, women and children who fled from there country earlier this year

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about accommodation of asylum seekers in particular areas, as this is an operational matter, not a decision for the Government or House of Commons.

You might be interested to sign this petition:

Fund increased housing provision for homeless people
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/588351
